translation.editSignup.delete.info1: Are you sure you want to delete your sign up to <1>{{event}}</1>?
translation.editSignup.delete.info2: If you delete your signup you will lose your spot in the queue. If you change your mind you can always sign up again to the event later, but you will be moved to the end of the queue.
translation.editSignup.editInstructions.email: The link will also be included in the confirmation email.
translation.editSignup.editInstructions: You can edit or delete your signup later by saving the URL of this page.
translation.editSignup.errors.closed: Your signup cannot be changed anymore as the signup for the event has closed.
translation.editSignup.errors.loadFailed: Your signup was not found. It might be already deleted.
translation.editSignup.errors.invalid: There are errors in your sign up.
translation.editSignup.namePublic: Show name in public signup list
translation.editSignup.position.openQuota: You are in the open quota in position {{position}}.
translation.editSignup.position.queue: You are in the queue in position {{position}}.
translation.editSignup.position.quota: You are in quota {{quota}} in position {{position}}.
translation.editSignup.publicQuestion: Answers to this field are public.
translation.editSignup.status.editFailed: Editing did not succeed. Make sure you have filled all the mandatory fields and try again.
translation.editSignup.status.signupFailed: Signup did not succeed. Make sure you have filled all the mandatory fields and try again.
translation.errors.title: Whoops, something went wrong
translation.events.column.name: Name
translation.events.title: Events
translation.signupState.disabled: You cannot sign up for this event.
translation.signupState.closed: The signup for this event has closed.
translation.singleEvent.loadFailed: The event was not found. It may be too old or deleted.
